column3:
NACK

I'm fine with sending the output somewhere else, but keep it behind a #define please. It produces huge amounts of output, to the point of slowing down the UI considerably.
Hmm, didn't seem like that much to me... just about once per AddToWallet, right?\n
Every time the timer runs, at least...\n
Note that #1205 adds debug logging for UI updates (but not as verbose as to flood the log).\n
